title: Understanding Applied Materials' Business Model And Performance Across Segments - Nasdaq.com
text: Applied Materials   ( AMAT  ) is the world's largest semiconductor fabrication equipment supplier based on revenue. It is also a leading supplier of LCD fabrication equipment to the flat panel display industry and of solar PV manufacturing systems to the solar industry.

You can view the Trefis interactive dashboard -  Applied Materials Revenue: How does Applied   Materials make money?   - You can modify our key drivers to arrive at your own estimates for the company's revenue.
According to Applied Materials Valuation   by Trefis, we have a price estimate of $46 per share for AMAT's stock.
